author: oheger
msg: Implemented getStringArray() in terms of the generic getArray() method.

author: oheger
msg: The to() method of PropertyConverter was lacking a trivial conversion to a
string. This feature is now available based to the toString() method.

author: oheger
msg: Implemented the new generic get methods in AbstractConfiguration.
AbstractConfiguration now has a property of type ConversionHandler. The
implementations of the new methods delegate to this converion handler object.

author: oheger
msg: Added some generic get methods to the ImmutableConfiguration interface.
This is related to [CONFIGURATION-508]. These methods are a generic form of
specialized data type conversion methods. Added corresponding (non functional)

author: oheger
msg: Removed the interpolate() method from PropertyConverter.
In future PropertyConverter will be package protected and deal only with type
